title: FIN - sans serif - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this bold blocky sans serif typeface.

Many thanks!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_lv8ndpfqnQ1qhei25o1_400_3861.jpg)

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Too few letters to be absolutely sure, but either of these would work:  
 [http://www.emigre.com/WebFonts/Triplex/Sans-Extra-Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050914/http:/www.emigre.com/WebFonts/Triplex/Sans-Extra-Bold "http://www.emigre.com/WebFonts/Triplex/Sans-Extra-Bold")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319050914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/") [Bold]
